<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 73

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Cyclone_ represents tumultuous evil plots. As long as it is invested, _The Cyclone_ bolsters you with helpful winds that grant you a +2 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks made to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36), [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37), and [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41). This increases to a +3 item bonus if you are at least 17th level.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> envision, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You cast [_whirlwind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1033). You do not treat the squares in the _whirlwind_ as difficult terrain, but all other creatures do. The level of the spell is one-half your level, rounded down (minimum 8th level), and the save DC is your class DC.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
